subject: Curlin (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: When Curlin makes his turf debut Saturday, the goal will not necessarily be to win, but to prove he belongs in the Prix de l’Arc de Triomphe, France’s most prestigious race, on Oct. 5.
snippet: When Curlin makes his turf debut Saturday, the goal will not necessarily be to win, but to prove he belongs in the Prix de l’Arc de Triomphe, France’s most prestigious race, on Oct. 5.
